name: King Christmas Card
description:
Item Details
 
     (162)
 
Shipping & Policies
Spread good tidings this festive season with this cheery Christmas card.

The card features a jolly king.

The design is printed onto 280gsm white hammered card and is blank inside so you can pen your own personal message. The card comes with a scarlet envelope and is packaged in a cello bag.

The card is also available in the following pack size:

Pack of 10 Cards (£20)

Please use the 'Contact' page if you would like to purchase any of these pack sizes. Additional shipping fees will apply.

Item Dimensions: W10.9 x H15.7cms

name: Inya Greetings Cards DIY Paper Craft Kit
description:
Create a free-standing display with the Inya greetings cards card set.

The three Native American inspired greetings card designs can be printed from your home computer and assembled by yourself.

The set includes one pop-up teepee, one pop-up camp fire and one greetings card featuring a horse print, inside of which you can pen your personal message. All three cards can be folded flat to fit inside a C6 envelope after assembly.

The card dimensions when standing are as follows:

Teepee Dimensions: W11 x H15.5cms
Camp Fire Dimensions: W5 x H6cms
Horse Card Dimensions: W7.3 x H8cms

The paper craft kit is available for instant download following purchase and the PDFs include assembly instructions. The templates are suitable for A4 paper but can accommodate US letter format also. For best results, print the designs onto white card.

You can print the designs as often as you like so long as it is for personal use only. The PDFs and assembled cards are not for commercial use.

The kit contains three PDFs which will be sent to your Big Cartel registered email address within 48 hours of purchase.

description:

The design is printed onto hammered card and there are approximately 100 crisp plain white detachable pages onto which you can jot your thoughts and ideas.

Notepad Dimensions: W10.2cm x H14.8cms

name: Teepee Notepad
description:
This A6 notepad features a colourful teepee pattern.

The design is printed onto hammered card and there are approximately 100 crisp plain white detachable pages onto which you can jot your thoughts and ideas.

Notepad Dimensions: W10.2cm x H14.8cms

name: Circus Strongman Birthday Card
description:
This handmade birthday card features a circus strong man.

The design is printed onto 280gsm white hammered card and is blank inside so you can pen your own personal message.

The card comes with a ruby red envelope, packaged in a cello bag and will be posted in a board backed envelope so that it reaches you in perfect condition.

Card Dimensions: W10.9 x H15.7cms

name: Feathers Notepad
description:
This A6 notepad features a bright and colourful feather pattern.

The design is printed onto hammered card and there are approximately 100 crisp plain white detachable pages onto which you can jot your thoughts and ideas.

Notepad Dimensions: W10.2cm x H14.8cms

description:

name: Native Notepad Collection
description:
This set of four A6 notepads features bright and cheery native themed designs. The patterns include Aztec, arrows, feathers and teepee. 

The designs are printed onto hammered card and there are approximately 100 crisp plain white detachable pages in each notepad onto which you can jot your thoughts and ideas.

Notepad Dimensions: W10.2 x H14.8cms

name: Native Badge Collection
description:
This set of four badges features bright and cheery native themed designs. The patterns include Aztec, arrows, feathers and teepee and the metal pin-back badges come packaged in a tab-topped cello bag.

The badges are a perfect way to brighten up your day!

Badge Dimensions: Diameter 5.6cm

name: Crafting Makes Me Happy Print
description:
The 'Crafting Makes Me Happy' print features an illustration of assorted sewing and knitting tools including knitting needles, vintage cotton reels, antique scissors and a decorative thimble. The illustration is digitally printed on smooth off-white 220gsm cartridge paper that is 100% acid free.

This print will be packaged in a protective plastic sleeve and shipped in a board-backed padded envelope to reach you in perfect condition.

The print is a perfect gift for the avid crafter.

Print Dimensions: W21 x H29.7cms

name: Circus Seal Birthday Card
description:
This handmade birthday card features a circus seal.

The design is printed onto 280gsm white hammered card and is blank inside so you can pen your own personal message.

The card comes with a mint green envelope, packaged in a cello bag and will be posted in a board backed envelope so that it reaches you in perfect condition.

Card Dimensions: W10.9 x H15.7cms
